steps.name: Heat butter in a pot and stir fry the garlic until fragrant
Add salt, pepper, sugar, water, and coconut juice. Mix well and bring to a boil
Add chicken pieces into the pot and cook until chicken is tender
Heat enough oil in a pot for deep frying, fry the chicken pieces until slightly golden brown (it should still be quite whitish). Serve immediately with chili and sweet soy sauce sambal
